alert.note: Alert for Southern Campbell (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 7:29PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Campbell County through 815 PM MDT... At 729 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Pine Tree Junction to 14 miles northwest of Bill to 8 miles north of Douglas. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Pine Tree Junction around 745 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Pumpkin Buttes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
